programme.title: The Cinema List
programme.desc: Set your phasers to stun and dive into some of the best moments from Star Trek, from Kirk facing his deadliest enemy in Star Trek: The Wrath of Kahn to a smart strategy in Star Trek Beyond.

programme.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
programme.desc: Romantic comedy drama starring Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet and Kirsten Dunst. When lonely Joel and free-spirited Clementine meet on a beach they instantly fall for one another. But it soon transpires they have already had a relationship, all memories of which have been wiped from their minds by a mysterious company called Lacuna Inc Michel Gondry - Director, Michel Gondry - Director Jim Carrey - Joel Barish Kate Winslet - Clementine Kruczynski Kirsten Dunst - Mary Mark Ruffalo - Stan Elijah Wood - Patrick Tom Wilkinson - Dr Howard Mierzwiak Jane Adams (2) - Carrie David Cross (2) - Rob Jim Carrey - Joel Barish Kate Winslet - Clementine Kruczynski Kirsten Dunst - Mary Mark Ruffalo - Stan Elijah Wood - Patrick Tom Wilkinson - Dr Howard Mierzwiak Jane Adams (2) - Carrie David Cross (2) - Rob.

programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: Oscar-winning historical drama starring Colin Firth, Helena Bonham Carter and Geoffrey Rush. As part of his royal duties, Prince Albert is required to speak at public events, a task made all the more difficult owing to his severe stammer. The death of his father and subsequent abdication of his older brother means that "Bertie" is to be crowned king. Unconventional speech therapist Lionel Logue is enlisted to help the future George VI find his voice - and despite Logue's disregard for all things stately, the two men form an unlikely bond Tom Hooper - Director, Tom Hooper - Director Colin Firth - \Albert\, King George Vl Helena Bonham Carter - Queen Elizabeth Geoffrey Rush - Lionel Logue Guy Pearce - \David\, Edward Vlll Michael Gambon - King George V Timothy Spall - Winston Churchill Jennifer Ehle - Myrtle Logue Derek Jacobi - Archbishop Cosmo Lang Claire Bloom - Queen Mary Anthony Andrews - Stanley Baldwin Tim Downie - Duke of Gloucester Eve Best - Wallis Simpson Freya Wilson - Princess Elizabeth Ramona Marquez - Princess Margaret Colin Firth - \Albert\, King George Vl Helena Bonham Carter - Queen Elizabeth Geoffrey Rush - Lionel Logue Guy Pearce - \David\, Edward Vlll Michael Gambon - King George V Timothy Spall - Winston Churchill Jennifer Ehle - Myrtle Logue Derek Jacobi - Archbishop Cosmo Lang Claire Bloom - Queen Mary Anthony Andrews - Stanley Baldwin Tim Downie - Duke of Gloucester Eve Best - Wallis Simpson Freya Wilson - Princess Elizabeth Ramona Marquez - Princess Margaret.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.sub-title: Documentary And Factual, War, Drama, Action, History ║ 2001 ║ 15
programme.desc: War drama based on real events, starring Josh Hartnett, Ewan McGregor and Tom Sizemore. On 3 October 1993, elite US troops were sent into Somalia's capital, Mogadishu, to capture two lieutenants working for the local warlord responsible for orchestrating a famine in the region. The ensuing 15-hour battle saw the deaths of nearly 20 American soldiers, and hundreds of Somalis, after two Black Hawk helicopters were shot down Ridley Scott - Director, Ridley Scott - Director Josh Hartnett - programme.title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Comedy, Fantasy ║ 1986 ║ PG
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and DeForest Kelley. In the 23rd century, Captain Kirk and his intrepid band of space travellers discover a probe in the vicinity of Earth that is trying to contact a humpback whale, a species that is extinct. In order to prevent the probe destroying the planet, Kirk and his crew visit 1986 San Francisco in order to locate two whales to take back to the future Leonard Nimoy - Director, Leonard Nimoy - Director William Shatner - Captain James T Kirk Leonard Nimoy - Spock Catherine Hicks - Dr Gillian Taylor DeForest Kelley - Dr Leonard \Bones\ McCoy James Doohan - Scotty George Takei - Sulu Walter Koenig - Chekov Nichelle Nichols - Commander Uhura Majel Barrett - Dr Christine Chapel Jane Wyatt - Amanda, Spock's mother Mark Lenard - Sarek Robin Curtis - Lieutenant Saavik Robert Ellenstein - Federal Council President John Schuck - Klingon ambassador William Shatner - Captain James T Kirk Leonard Nimoy - Spock Catherine Hicks - Dr Gillian Taylor DeForest Kelley - Dr Leonard \Bones\ McCoy James Doohan - Scotty George Takei - Sulu Walter Koenig - Chekov Nichelle Nichols - Commander Uhura Majel Barrett - Dr Christine Chapel Jane Wyatt - Amanda, Spock's mother Mark Lenard - Sarek Robin Curtis - Lieutenant Saavik Robert Ellenstein - Federal Council President John Schuck - Klingon ambassador.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Buddy comedy starring Arnold Schwarzenegger and Danny DeVito. programme.title: Frost/Nixon
programme.desc: Historical drama starring Frank Langella and Michael Sheen. For three years after leaving the White House in disgrace following the Watergate scandal, former US President Richard Nixon has remained silent on the matter. So when talk-show host David Frost persuades Nixon to agree to a series of televised interviews, it is the perfect opportunity for the British TV star to make a name for himself. programme.desc: Oscar-winning biographical drama starring Meryl Streep and Robert Redford. Karen Blixen leaves her native Denmark in 1913 to marry a Swedish baron and run a coffee farm in Kenya. programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. But when the book suddenly becomes a surprise hit in Mexico, his publicist insists he travel there on a promotional tour. programme.title: Taylor v Mason 2002
programme.desc: In a match that saw the first-ever televised nine-darter, revisit this classic contest between Phil Taylor and Chris Mason at the 2002 World Matchplay. Contains flashing images.

programme.title: PDC Classics 2023
programme.desc: The World Championship final from 2009 when Phil Taylor met Van Barneveld. The Power was targeting a 14th title, while Barney sought revenge for his 2007 defeat. Contains flashing images.

programme.title: World Club Challenge Hlts
programme.desc: In the Betfred World Club Challenge, Wigan Warriors host NRL Premiers Penrith Panthers at the DW Stadium in one of club rugby league's biggest encounters. (24.02).

programme.title: R/Lge Retro: St Helens V Brisbane
programme.desc: Look back at a thriller at Reebok Stadium, as Super League champions St Helens face NRL Premiers Brisbane for the right to be crowned champions of the world.

programme.title: S/Lge: Wigan v Catalans Hlts
programme.desc: Wigan Warriors host Catalans Dragons in the Betfred Super League. Both the current champions Wigan and Catalans were dealt surprising defeats in round nine of the season. (02.05).

programme.title: S/Lge: Warrington v Hull FC Hlts
programme.desc: Warrington Wolves host Hull FC in the Betfred Super League. The Black and Whites fell on home soil previously to the Rhinos, while Warrington also tasted defeat to the Red Devils. (03.05).

programme.title: S/Lge: Warrington v Hull KR Hlts
programme.desc: Warrington Wolves and Hull KR clash in the Betfred Super League. Warrington inflicted a ninth defeat this season upon the Black and Whites' rivals Hull FC last week. (09.05).

programme.title: S/Lge: Catalans v Leeds Hlts
programme.desc: Catalans Dragons face Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League. The Rhinos take a home win over the Broncos to the south of France, as the Catalans try to respond after defeat. (11.05).

programme.title: World Club Challenge Highlights
programme.desc: The 2023 season of the Betfred Wheelchair Super League comes to an end with the final. Leeds Rhinos and Halifax Panthers contested last year's showpiece. (15.10).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Lomachenko v Kambosos
programme.desc: In his quest to recapture a world title, Ukraine's legendary Vasiliy Lomachenko travels to Perth to face Australia's George Kambosos for the vacant IBF lightweight championship. (12.05).

programme.title: Fight Night: Kholmatov v Ford
programme.desc: Uzbek phenom Otabek Kholmatov faces off against American standout Raymond Ford for the vacant WBA featherweight world title in Verona, New York. (03.03).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: Week 15 of the NFL season continues as the Buffalo Bills host a Dallas Cowboys side enjoying a run of five straight wins, including a win over their NFC East rivals Philadelphia. (17.12).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: The Baltimore Ravens and the San Francisco 49ers bring an end to the Christmas Day slate of NFL games. Both sides lead their respective divisions and have secured playoff spots. (25.12).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: Two division rivals square off on Christmas Day at Lincoln Financial Field during week 16 of the NFL, as the Philadelphia Eagles, who have a playoff spot, host the New York Giants. (25.12).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: Week 16 of the NFL season continues as the Denver Broncos host the New England Patriots. Denver's playoff hopes took a hit last week after falling to the NFC North-leading Lions. (24.12).

programme.title: LIVE: Live: Investec Champions Cup
programme.sub-title: S2023E63 ║ Live: Leinster Rugby v Toulouse ║ Sport
programme.desc: Leinster v Toulouse (Kick-off 2.45pm). Coverage of the final, which takes place at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. Both sides have featured in the final at least once in the last three years, with Leinster appearing on the last two occasions. The Irish side have lost the last two finals against La Rochelle, so will be hoping it is third time lucky this time around. Toulouse beat La Rochelle in their last appearance in a final in 2021, when they came out on top with a 22-17 victory.

programme.title: LIVE: Live UEFA Europa Conference League
programme.sub-title: S2023E132 ║ Live: Olympiacos v Fiorentina ║ Sport
programme.desc: Olympiacos v Fiorentina (Kick-off 8.00pm), which takes place at Agia Sophia Stadium in Athens, Greece. This is the second year in a row that Fiorentina have reached the final of the competition, after they made it to last year's showpiece event before losing 2-1 to West Ham United. The Italian side beat Club Brugge 4-3 on aggregate in the semi-finals to make it to this stage, while Olympiacos beat Aston Villa 6-2 over the two semi-final matches.
